quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易混淆`unstimulating`（事物乏味、不令人兴奋）与形近词`unstimulated`（人未被刺激）或词根推导时误判主动/被动含义
quiz_item.sentence: The book was so **unstimulating** that I couldn’t even finish the first chapter—it had no plot twists, no relatable characters, and no interesting ideas.

option.definition: 未被刺激的；不兴奋的（指人）
未被激动的；无热情的（指人）
乏味的；不令人兴奋的（指事物）
